name: Friendship Simulator 2020
description:
Make friends, have a chat, and keep those friendships alive as you gain popularity in this thriling and relaxing slice of life game.

Build up your contact list but be careful not to get overwhelmed as you become more reputable in your community. You don't want people to think that you don't care!

Recommended full screen.

Jam entry by Matthew Beanland and Connor Hartwell
